Taephung International Investment Group Founded
   Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Talks took place here between the Korean Committee for the Promotion of Economic Cooperation with Foreign Countries and the delegation of the Taephung International Investment on Sept. 27.
 The talks resulted in the foundation of the Taephung International Investment Group involving the above-said committee and investors of different countries.    
 The group will open its coordinating office in Pyongyang and undertake businesses for the inducement of investments and its realization in cooperation with interested investors and international banking organs.

articles.content:
Greetings to Botswanan President
   Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Botswanan President Festus G. Mogae on Monday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the independence of Botswana.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in mutual interests, the message wished him greater success in his noble work for the prosperity and socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Ro Tu Chol Meets New Kuwaiti Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Kuwaiti Ambassador
   Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Faisal Rashed Al-Ghais, new Kuwaiti ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
